# removeAllItems()

**Instance Method**

Removes all items from the web history.

## Declaration

```swift
func removeAllItems()
```

## Discussion

When successful, this method posts a notification ([doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WebHistoryAllItemsRemovedNotification]).

## Adding and Removing History Items

- **addItems(_:)**: Inserts or updates the specified items in the web history.
- **removeItems(_:)**: Removes the specified items from the web history.

items.description: Inserts or updates the specified items in the web history.
items.name: addItems(_:)

items.description: Removes the specified items from the web history.
items.name: removeItems(_:)
